item.title: Lawmakers respond to U.S. launching strikes on 3 Iranian nuclear facilities
item.description: Congress members offered a split response after President Trump's announcement that the U.S. had launched strikes on three Iranian nuclear facilities.

item.title: U.S. launches strikes on 3 Iranian nuclear facilities, Trump says
item.description: The U.S. reached out to Iran diplomatically to say the strikes are all the U.S. plans and that regime change efforts are not planned, sources said.

item.title: 6 dead, 2 missing after boat capsizes on Lake Tahoe during storm, Coast Guard says
item.description: Six people died and two others are missing after a 27-foot boat capsized on Lake Tahoe on Saturday afternoon, the U.S. Coast Guard said.

item.title: Trump calls U.S. strikes on Iran a "spectacular military success"
item.description: President Trump announced earlier Saturday night that the U.S. had launched strikes against three Iranian nuclear sites.

item.title: Vietnam vets who left school for service get diplomas over six decades later
item.description: Operation Recognition is a program through the Iowa Department of Veterans Affairs that's given more than 100 veterans a chance to receive their high ...
